subject: Track and Field
Extortion and Blackmail
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Valentin Balakhnichev, a former head of the Russian track and field federation, rejected allegations that his organization worked with top officials from the International Association of Athletics Federations to try to blackmail athletes before the 2012 Olympics.
